items.text: shorter delivery this time on off, pushed down to long-off again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: flighted a lot more around off, he makes room and drives it through the covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: pitched up, driven straight down to mid off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: full on off again, the bowler dives to his left to stop the drive back from Guptill
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: pitched up on off, no room and he pushes it back
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: full again, driven with more power just missing the non-striker's stumps this time for one to long-on
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: too short, there are short boundaries too, and Guptill rocks back seeing this long hop to pull it for six over the midwicket boundary
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, SIX runs

items.text: pretty full on leg, pushed down to long-on rather easily
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: short and flat from outside off, slapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: plenty of room outside off, he slashes hard and get a thick bottom edge to short third man
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: on length outside off, he pushes it back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, no run

items.text: bit slower and closer to off stump, Nicholls comes closer to the line of the ball and sweeps that away just past the square-leg umpire and the ball curves further to beat the fielder in the deep
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, FOUR runs

items.text: reverse paddle deflects off the keeper's gloves, very tough to call that a drop but it did touch the gloves. Nicholls actually hit it off the back of the bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: pushes the delivery down to long-on this time
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: turning in, tucked towards midwicket and no time for a run
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: slams the length delivery back to the bowler, it deflects off his leg and to the leg side for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.preText: Some towels and drinks come out for the batsmen even though we just had a drinks break three overs ago
items.text: full on middle, pushed with the turn to long off
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: a low full toss for Nicholls and he flicks it to leg for one more
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: in the block hole from Sabbir, blocked back by Guptill
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.text: full on the pads now, tucked away to deep midwicket for a single
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: too short and wide outside off, it's a bit quick for Nicholls to send it past cover
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: closer to the stumps this time and it's helped with the turn to long-on
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: enough room outside off for Nicholls to cut it wide of third man for two in the gap
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: uses hard hands to find cover point this time
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, no run

items.text: bit too short, and this time he rocks back to slam it between cover point and cover for a four that brings up his half-century, his seventh in ODIs
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, FOUR runs
